num_iterations.description: Number of iterations over the same surface

n_iterations_track.description: Number of track iterations over all surfaces

wvfm_discard_samples.description: Flag that activates discarding samples: Desactivated(false); Activated(true)

wvfm_discard_samples_begin.description: Index of the first sample to discard

wvfm_discard_samples_end.description: Index of the last sample to discard

weighting_win_type.description: The type of weighting window in the multilooking

weighting_win_width.description: Width of the window in range bins

Thn_flag.description: Flag that activate the use of Thn in estimation: Desactivated(false); Activated(true)

fit_noise.description: Flag that activates the noise estimation, otherwise using the values in Thn_w_first and Thn_w_width: Desactivated(false); Activated(true)

Thn_w_first.description: Gate number after if mask to start thermal noise windowing; this index must be > 0

Thn_w_width.description: Thermal noise window in range bins

threshold_noise.description: Threshold used to estimate the samples used in the noise window estimation

max_iter_noise.description: Number maximum of iterations in the noise estimation

rou_flag.description: Flag that activates the fit roughness: Desactivated(false); Activated(true)

Hs.description: Value of the Hs when fitting the MSS or roughness

window_type_a.description: Window type: hamming, hanning, boxcar, none

window_a_fixed_value.description: Fixed value of window: sigma gaussian

window_type_r.description: Window type: hamming, hanning, boxcar, none

window_r_fixed_value.description: Fixed value of window: sigma gaussian

LUT_ximax.description: Maximum value of the gl*k parameter LUT

LUT_ximin.description: Minimum value of the gl*k parameter LUT

LUT_step.description: Step of gl*k parameter in the LUT

percent_leading_edge.description: percentage of peak detect to establish the mid-point leading edge

ini_error_epoch.description: Differential error of the ACDC retracker

initial_param_fit_feedback_flag.description: Flag that activates the updating of the initial parameters from the previous surfaces

win_smooth.description: Size of the smoothing window over the retracked parameters in a given track

range_index_method.description: conventional: Creating the range vector directly from number of samples; resampling: Creating the range vector from number of samples and zero padding

LUT_f0_path.description: Path of the Look Up Table used in the model
